pages.text: Blast Resistance uses the $(d)Blast Protection$() enchantment and can $(l)reduce or even remove$() the block damage caused by explosions which affected you. No more fixing holes from pesky $(l)$(a)creeper$() explosions near you.

If an explosion occurs and you were damaged by it, the blocks have a $(l)chance$(), based on the enchantment level, to $(l)not be destroyed$(). At $(d)level 5$() $(l)no blocks are destroyed$() from the explosion.
